title: Localization key cannot be blank when adding
description: When adding a new localization key, if the key is left blank, the externalized text cannot be displayed in the chart.
OB: In the properties file, when the key is left blank but still has a valid value, the externalized text is not displayed in the chart title.
EB: The externalized text should be displayed in the chart title even if the key is left blank.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Set an externalized text in the chart title. 
2. Leave the key for the externalized text blank and save it. Observe that the text is not displayed in the chart title.
